h2_title: How to Complete the Old Man's Questline
content: Return to the stairs where you first left to see the old man. Cross the covered bridge in the center, then take out the bull guard and master by the stairs on the left. Head up here, and activate the next Keeper's Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'How to Complete the Old Man's Questline'.
The content is as follows:
Return to the stairs where you first left to see the old man. Cross the covered bridge in the center, then take out the bull guard and master by the stairs on the left. Head up here, and activate the next Keeper's Shrine.
